definition: biopsy/abbr. to 活檢|活检[huo2 jian3]
pinyin: huo2 ti3 zu3 zhi1 jian3 cha2

sentences.english: A lover of animals, especially one opposed to vivisection.
sentences.chinese: 活體動物來進行研究的人。

sentences.english: Yang Fengmao learns and gold deep water Lin Ying baby be vivisection experiments, very worried.
sentences.chinese: 楊豐懋和金深水獲悉林嬰嬰被做活體實驗，萬分着急。

sentences.english: I believe I am not interested to know whether vivisection produces results that are profitable to the human race or doesn t.
sentences.chinese: 活體解剖是否對人類有益，這一點我沒有興趣去了解。

sentences.english: The KCGMH-LTP performed the first living donor liver transplant without transfusion of blood or blood products in the world.
sentences.chinese: 高雄長庚醫院完成全球首例未輸血活體肝臟移植手術。

sentences.english: Objective To uate the effect of living donor liver transplantation on the treatment of severe hepatitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究活體肝移植治療重型肝炎的療效。

sentences.english: Methods The enzyme activities were measured in vitro with an ultraviolet-visible spectrophotometer.
sentences.chinese: 方法採用紫外可見分光光度計活體測定酶的活性。

sentences.english: Hot Streak now also affects Living Bomb.
sentences.chinese: 現在活體爆彈也會影響這個天賦。
人們不再活體解剖動物了。

sentences.english: Animal-rights activists campaign against all forms of vivisection.
sentences.chinese: 動物權力運動人士宣導反對各式活體解剖。

sentences.english: Bacterial endospores are the most resistant living structures, known.
sentences.chinese: 內生芽孢是目前所知的最具抗性的生命活體結構。

sentences.english: The neoplasm was diagnosed by cystoscopic biopsy.
sentences.chinese: 而腫瘤是經膀胱鏡活體切片而確定之。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the safety of living-related kidney donors in the early stage of operation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討親屬活體供腎者術後早期的安全性。

sentences.english: It is also produced when living organisms respire .
sentences.chinese: 二氧化碳也可經由活體生物的呼吸作用而產生。

sentences.english: So the topsoil is bits of rock mixed with things that are once alive.
sentences.chinese: 可見，土壤是石粒和曾經是活體的物質的混合物。

sentences.english: It is also slightly similar to P. marina.
sentences.chinese: 此外，與海洋僞鍾蟲活體時也略相似。

sentences.english: The most is, with living donors.
sentences.chinese: 最難忘的是活體器官捐贈者。

definition: to rear (an animal) in an enclosure
to hunt and kill (an animal or fish)
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
